page.title: 04Public Houses
page.content: RED LION (198 YEARS OLD) WHITE HART (150 YEARS OLD) THREE HORSE SHOES (REBUILT 1961)OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK 11-00-15.00 AND 17.30-23-00. BUSIEST DAY-SATURDAY, WHEN RED LION EXPECTS APPROXIMATELY 500 PEOPLE AND THE OTHER PUBLIC HOUSES APPROXIMATELY 200 PEOPLE EACH.RED LION HAS THREE CELLERS,WHITE HART TWO CELLERS,AND THREE HORSE SHOES ONE CELLER.THE FOHRMER HAS DELIVERIES 5 PER WEEK AND THE OTHERS WEEKLY.IN ALL CASES BEER IS THE MOST POPULAR DRINK,BRANDY(72P-Â£1.60)THE MOST EXPENSIVE AND SOFT DRINKS(20P-40P)THE CHEAPEST DRINK SOLD.THE RED LION HAS A RESTAURANT,THE WHITE HART SERVES LUNCHES AND ALL THREE HAVE OUT DOOR TABLES.ONLY THE RED LION AND WHITE HART HAVE A BEER GARDEN WITH AMUSEMENTS FOR YOUNGER CHILDREN.THE RED LION CAN CATER FOR DISCOS AND THE WHITE HART FOR BARBECUES.
